about_the_game:
For two hundred years your corpse has rested, deeply closed and sealed with magic, and everything around you has been cursed. But the one called the Messiah of Hell came and took with him the last piece of your evil dead soul. Get to know each other.

The Messiah knows he's not the only one.

Follow the enemy by killing hordes of opponents, demolishing everything on your way. Make returning to Hell a relief after meeting you.

You are no longer human.
And you don't want to be anymore. Use magic to burn enemies, jump on them from heights, and send them back to the world of the dead in a variety of ways.

- He is the one to whom you are to bow.

He doesn’t know yet.

Meet Souldead.

Souldead is a first-person shooter with a great deal of emphasis on action and exploration. Fight horizontally and vertically, attack enemies from above, use magic to tramp the ground and send demons back to hell. Jump on ledges and use your magic to hurl objects at your opponents and destroy walls, behind which there is often a reward.

Search the surroundings for story items that you can use to create the key to the next location.

Main features:

- Fast action with new gameplay mechanics
- A beautiful environment full of secret locations
- Elements of exploration and time travel games
- Explore an ancient, dark castle, destroy hordes of enemies in Rome, visit Victorian England
- Never seen before weapons - paladin’s heart, holy cross

content_descriptors.notes: Souldead will contain violence, blood and gore, horror elements and scary characters.

name: Souldead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The awakening of Hell has awakened you. Go through different worlds to catch the Messiah of Hell and take back what was taken from you. Souldead is a fast-paced dark fantasy FPS shooter with a modern take on the gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support
